txt.en: Khôr-buri-Ghân is inside the cave that was his brother's favourite place.

'What a relief! It's just an Elf! There are rumours about these statues. They say they come to life when you aren't looking at them, and have slain whole encampments!\n\n'The war hasn't gone as the bosses wanted, and I thought I'd slip away and find my own place to hide out until everything blows over. And this cave would be perfect if it wasn't for these horrible statues! I think I'll do what I can to smash them to pieces, and then this will be a perfect hideout for Turkalb.'
Descend to the lower chamber of the cave and confront the Orc
Confront Turkalb
Talk to Khôr-buri-Ghân inside the cave
'This cave favourite place of Bhai-buri-Ghân? Do not know why. Too damp for Khôr-buri-Ghân.\n\n'What special about cave?'

'This more statues than in village or in forest. So many different sizes. Bhai-buri-Ghân come here often. This carving place? Brother Bhai-buri-Ghân carve sculpture here? Maybe help carve some of these, too?'

Khôr-buri-Ghân suddenly freezes, and points silently down towards the lower chamber.

'Gorgûn,' he whispers.
Help protect Khôr-buri-Ghân

'What a relief! It's just a [placeholder]! There are rumours about these statues. They say they come to life when you aren't looking at them, and have slain whole encampments!\n\n'The war hasn't gone as the bosses wanted, and I thought I'd slip away and find my own place to hide out until everything blows over. And this cave would be perfect if it wasn't for these horrible statues! I think I'll do what I can to smash them to pieces, and then this will be a perfect hideout for Turkalb.'
'Who's there? Show yourself!'
'But first, you have to die!'
'I am not dying here!'

'Statue carved by Bhai-buri-Ghân no longer have feel of gorgûn. Khôr-buri-Ghân give memento of brother to you, [placeholder]. Maybe will help on road you walk, when evil about. Khôr-buri-Ghân not need memento to remember Bhai-buri-Ghân. Will remember whenever come to favourite place.\n\n'Always be friend to Wild Men. Always be foe to gorgûn. Wind in the trees, water in the lake. Now you take memento far away, use for good. Remember Bhai-buri-Ghân, remember Khôr-buri-Ghân.'
'No! Noooo! It was true! The rumours were true!'
'Always be friend to Wild Men. Always be friend to Khôr-buri-Ghân.'
DNT - Blah!
DNT - Blah!
Khôr-buri-Ghân motions for you to descend and confront the Orc, and he will follow
DNT - Blah!
DNT - Blah!
You have come with Khôr-buri-Ghân to the cave that was his brother Bhai-buri-Ghân's favourite place.
DNT - Blah!
Khôr-buri-Ghân is inside the cave that was his brother's favourite place.
An Orc has found Bhai-buri-Ghân's cave.
DNT - Blah!
Khôr-buri-Ghân is inside the cave that was his brother's favourite place.
Talk to Khôr-buri-Ghân inside the cave
Talk to Khôr-buri-Ghân inside the cave
Follow Khôr-buri-Ghân down the tunnel
The Orc Turkalb has found Bhai-buri-Ghân's favourite cave.
Defeat Turkalb
'Maybe find out deeper in. Follow Khôr-buri-Ghân!'
'So many statues! Never seen so many in one place!
Khôr-buri-Ghân is in his brother's favourite cave.
'[placeholder]...'
'This is not place for gorgûn!'
'This place belong to Bhai-buri-Ghân.'
'He brother of Khôr-buri-Ghân, killed by gorgûn.'
'But he not gone. This his place.'
Instance: Heirloom of the Wild Men
'Khôr-buri-Ghân will come here and think of him, and he still be here.'

'What a relief! It's just an Elf! There are rumours about these statues. They say they come to life when you aren't looking at them, and have slain whole encampments!\n\n'The war hasn't gone as the bosses wanted, and I thought I'd slip away and find my own place to hide out until everything blows over. And this cave would be perfect if it wasn't for these horrible statues! I think I'll do what I can to smash them to pieces, and then this will be a perfect hideout for Turkalb.'
The Memento of Bhai-buri-Ghân has been cleansed of Mordor's corruption!
